channel.description:
[center]Play Now
[IMG]http://png.findicons.com/files/icons/1581/silk/16/controller.png[/img] [URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/13mnjuv2ohy5ct6/Forgotten%20Memoriesv2.jar"]Download[/URL] https://dl.dropbox.com/s/13mnjuv2ohy5ct6/Forgotten%20Memoriesv2.jar (web client and website coming soon)
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://w11.zetaboards.com/Forgotten_Memories/index/"]Forums[/URL]
"http://w11.zetaboards.com/Forgotten_Memories/index/ idk why but the button is broke lol (not done yet)[/center]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3964045/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3964047/4yQgbqe.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3964527/Screenshot_5.png[/img]
[Spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://i1347.photobucket.com/albums/p704/newrealtyrsps/Screenshot_7_zps97f16a27.png[/img]
[URL=http://s1347.photobucket.com/user/newrealtyrsps/media/Screenshot_9_zps20d7cd4c.png.html][IMG]http://i1347.photobucket.com/albums/p704/newrealtyrsps/Screenshot_9_zps20d7cd4c.png[/img][/URL]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3958612/Screenshot_1.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3958634/Screenshot_2.png[/img] more coming soon... [/Spoiler] [Spoiler=Server Features] - EXTREMELY fast training, i will be adding ::master soon depending on how eco goes- - Instant Switching - - Clue Scrolls - - Great Pkp Shop - - Shops with all the provisions needed for pking - - Achievement System (Pking and bosses, works like milestones) - - Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points - - Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! - - Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! - - perfect models and rotations for newer items - - Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers - - Daily 2 hours of double pkp (handled by time relative to the vps) - - Non-Cheatable - - Bossing spread around wilderness - - Slayer System with slayer shop - - great economy - Amazing pking - great server for clans - lots of bosses to battle - oldschool feel - enjoyable - great ep drops - perfect target system - vengeance - Full clan chat - Slayer Helm effect! [/Spoiler]
Go back to the old client!
if the old client dosent work, re-dl it, i updated all the links! - hex

more coming soon…
[/Spoiler]
[Spoiler=Server Features]

  • EXTREMELY fast training, i will be adding ::master soon depending on how eco goes-
  • Instant Switching -
  • Clue Scrolls -
  • Great Pkp Shop -
  • Shops with all the provisions needed for pking -
  • Achievement System (Pking and bosses, works like milestones) -
  • Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points -
  • Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! -
  • Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! -
  • perfect models and rotations for newer items -
  • Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers -
  • Daily 2 hours of double pkp (handled by time relative to the vps) -
  • Non-Cheatable -
  • Bossing spread around wilderness -
  • Slayer System with slayer shop -
  • great economy
  • Amazing pking
  • great server for clans
  • lots of bosses to battle
  • oldschool feel
  • enjoyable
  • great ep drops
  • perfect target system
  • vengeance
  • Full clan chat
  • Slayer Helm effect!
    [/Spoiler]

Go back to the old client!

if the old client dosent work, re-dl it, i updated all the links! - hex
